mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ttms.ticket(user_id, schedule_id, seat_id) VALUES('-1', #{scheduleId}, #{seatId});
mapper.select: SELECT ticket.ticket_id ticket_id, ticket.ticket_status ticket_status, seat.seat_row seat_row, seat.seat_col seat_col, seat.seat_status seat_status FROM (SELECT * FROM ttms.ticket WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}) ticket LEFT JOIN ttms.seat seat ON ticket.seat_id = seat.seat_id;
SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM ttms.ticket WHERE ticket_id in ${ticketsId} AND ticket_status = 1) as ticket JOIN ttms.seat seat ON ticket.seat_id = seat.seat_id AND seat.seat_status = 1;
SELECT schedule.ticketPrice FROM(SELECT * FROM ttms.ticket WHERE ticket_id = #{ticketId}) ticket LEFT JOIN ttms.schedule schedule ON ticket.schedule_id = schedule.schedule_id
